name: Rabyni
overview: Reiji Imari is an ordinary teenager who doesn't get much attention from his female schoolmates. He has a tendency to voyeurism and likes spying on girls and taking their photos. One day his young and attractive teacher catches him during such an escapade, and as a result he is obliged to follow her orders, which may also include sexual services. Rabyni (A Russian word meaning "female slaves") plays like a Japanese-style adventure, albeit without regular verb commands and no possibility to interact with the environment by selecting objects from a menu. Most of the gameplay involves repeatedly visiting different locations and triggering events. There are no branches in the storyline. Explicit sexual cutscenes are animated.
